Moo::OmniLight

Moo::OmniLight Class Reference

This class represents an omni-directional light with a colour, position and an attenuation range. More...

Detailed Description

This class represents an omni-directional light with a colour, position and an attenuation range.

void Moo::OmniLight::worldTransform ( const Matrix &  transform  ) 

Transform the the light to worldspace.

The worldTransform of the light must be an orthogonal matrix with uniform scale for the light to scale properly.
